alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Eastern Magic Valley; Lower Snake River Plain; Marsh and Arbon Highlands; Raft River Region; Shoshone, Lava Beds; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains; Upper Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 09 at 1:47AM MDT until April 09 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West-southwest winds 20 to 30 MPH with gusts up to 50 MPH expected. * WHERE...The eastern Magic Valley, Raft River region, Arco Desert, Snake Plain, and adjacent mountains, including but not limited to Burley, Heyburn, Shoshone, Carey, American Falls, Aberdeen, Pocatello, Chubbuck, Blackfoot, Idaho National Laboratory, Idaho Falls, Ammon, Rigby, and Rexburg. This includes large portions of Interstate 84, Interstate 86, and Interstate 15. * WHEN...Through 9 PM this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Unsecured outdoor objects may be blown around. Patchy blowing dust may result in areas of reduced visibility.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Eastern Magic Valley; Lower Snake River Plain; Marsh and Arbon Highlands; Raft River Region; Shoshone, Lava Beds; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains; Upper Snake River Plain
